    • deleteById

      @CacheEvict(key="#id") public boolean deleteById(String id)
      Deletes a resource by id. It also deletes all owners of this resource.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface ResourceService
      Parameters:
      id - - id of the resource to be deleted.
      Returns:

      Specified by:
      updateById in interface ResourceService
      Parameters:
      id - - id of the resource to be updated.
